projectDesc: This project aims to build an full-stack website where user can buy product, admin can manage the products.
bigdes: This is a semi e-commerce website
Users can login, register to the website
User can explore the Products, see details of the products
USer can order products, edit his/her order, see order status
User can give ratings to the webapp
There is  dedicated dashboard for users and admin
Admin can see the users, make another user as admin, see the orders
Admin can update orders, delete orders, change the order status.

projectDesc: This project is a tour management  system that allows users to surf around.
bigdes: This is a travel agency website
Users can login, register to the website
User can explore the travel packages, see details of the packages
USer can book a tour package, edit his/her booking, see booking status
User can see travel blogs
There is  dedicated dashboard for users and admin
Admin can see the users, see the bookings
Admin can update booking, delete booking, change the booking status.

projectDesc: Shafa Care Plus HealthCare systems provide users medical and other information, can take appointments
bigdes: This is a medical theme website
Users can login, register to the website
User can explore the medical packages, see details of the packages
USer can book a medical appointment, edit his/her appointment, see appointment status
User can see doctors list for different departments
There is google signup and signIn options for user
User can view Details of his/her appointment and can edit his/her appointment
Localstorage is used in this project to save the appointments of the user in local device

projectDesc: This project involves the development of an frontend website build with CSS
bigdes: This is a Honda CBR website
The website is made with pure HTML
Bootstrap is used to style the website
Bootstrap Card, Container, Button and other components are being used
Careousal is used for practice purpose
Bootstrap Form is used in this website
Footer is used with three column responsive.
The full website is made responsive by using Bootstrap responsive classes.
